title: Himi 260
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Oku tau tupu ta’e hoko
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
Ka koe kakai loto hē,
Pea angahala.
2.
Ko e tupu angakovi,
Pea ta’e’ilo
‘A e ‘Eiki angalelei,
Ko hotau ‘Otua.
3.
Ko e kakai ongonoa,
Pea houhau’ia,
Pea mo’ua, ki he mate
Fakalaumālie.
4.
Pea ko hono totongi,
Ki he angakovi,
Ko e mate ‘angaua,
Pea lī ki heli. *
